mechanic.description: Game rules (leader vs joiner, stacking limits, etc.)

claim_joiner_top_right_only.text: Rally joiners only contribute the first hero's top-right expedition skill.

claim_leader_9_skills.text: Rally leaders provide 9 expedition skills (3 heroes x 3 skills each).

claim_top_4_joiner_skills.text: Top 4 highest level expedition skills from all joiners are applied.

claim_jessie_dmg_boost.text: Jessie's top-right expedition skill (Stand of Arms) increases all-troops damage dealt by +5/10/15/20/25% per level.

claim_sergey_dmg_reduction.text: Sergey's top-right expedition skill (Defenders' Edge) reduces damage taken by -4/8/12/16/20% per level.

claim_chief_gear_global.text: Chief Gear provides global buffs that apply in ALL combat modes.

claim_hero_gear_personal.text: Hero Gear only affects the individual hero it's equipped on.

claim_joiner_gear_low_roi.text: Hero gear investment on rally joiners has minimal impact because joiners contribute skills, not personal damage.

claim_dps_personal_not_rally.text: DPS (damage per second) is personal hero damage; rally outcomes scale with buffs, not individual DPS.

joiner_hero_choice.why_pattern: Joiner applies only one skill -> choose strongest top-right effect.
joiner_hero_choice.tradeoff_pattern: Hero gear ROI is low here.
joiner_hero_choice.next_action_pattern: Put this hero first in march; level that skill.

rally_leader_choice.why_pattern: Leader determines 9 skills -> choose heroes with all-troops buffs/strong expedition kit.
rally_leader_choice.tradeoff_pattern: Hero gear matters more than for joiners, but chief gear still dominates.
rally_leader_choice.next_action_pattern: Use this as your rally lead lineup; upgrade chief ring/amulet first.

chief_gear_upgrade.tradeoff_pattern: Spreads resources; focus on ring/amulet first.

dont_do_warning.why_pattern: This investment doesn't propagate in your chosen mode.
dont_do_warning.example_pattern: Gearing a joiner hero yields minimal rally impact.

jessie_attack_joiner.title: Use Jessie as your rally joiner for offense
jessie_attack_joiner.why_this: As a rally joiner, only your first hero's top-right expedition skill is applied. Jessie's top-right gives an all-troops damage dealt boost, which is one of the best offensive joiner effects.

reasons.claim: Joiners contribute only the first hero's top-right expedition skill.
Jessie's top-right expedition skill increases all-troops damage dealt by +5-25%.

tradeoffs: Jessie's hero gear investment has low ROI as a joiner; prioritize Chief Gear instead if resources are limited.
assumptions: You are joining (not leading) the rally
Your Jessie top-right skill is leveled reasonably
next_actions: Put Jessie in slot #1 of the joining march
Level Jessie's top-right skill before investing in Jessie hero gear

sergey_defense_joiner.title: Use Sergey as your garrison/defense rally joiner
sergey_defense_joiner.why_this: Joiner uses only top-right skill; Sergey provides universal damage taken reduction that helps the entire rally survive longer.

reasons.claim: Joiners contribute only the first hero's top-right expedition skill.
Sergey's top-right expedition skill reduces damage taken by -4-20%.

tradeoffs: Sergey is best for defense; for offense rallies, Jessie provides more value.
assumptions: You are joining a defense or garrison rally
Your Sergey top-right skill is leveled
next_actions: Put Sergey in slot #1 when joining defense rallies

jeronimo_rally_leader.title: Use Jeronimo as your rally leader

confidence.reason: S+ tier + multiple all-troops expedition buffs

jeronimo_rally_leader.why_this: Leader uses 9 skills; Jeronimo has multiple all-troops offensive expedition effects that apply rally-wide impact.

reasons.claim: Rally leaders provide 9 expedition skills (3 heroes x 3 skills).
Jeronimo is S+ tier with strong offensive expedition skills.

tradeoffs: As leader, chief gear still dominates but hero gear ROI is higher than for joiners.
assumptions: You are leading the rally (not joining)
next_actions: Use Jeronimo as primary rally lead
Prioritize Chief Gear ring/amulet, then consider Jeronimo hero gear

molly_field_not_rally.title: Gear Molly for field PvP, not rallies
molly_field_not_rally.why_this: Molly excels at personal DPS, but DPS is personal damage. Rally outcomes scale with buffs, and joiners don't bring DPS value - they bring skills.

reasons.claim: DPS is personal hero damage; rally outcomes scale with buffs.
Hero gear investment on rally joiners has minimal impact.

tradeoffs: Molly with gear dominates field PvP but that investment doesn't translate to rally performance.
assumptions: You use Molly in both field and rally contexts
next_actions: Gear Molly if field/solo PvP is your focus
Don't expect Molly gear to improve rally results significantly

chief_gear_priority.title: Prioritize Chief Gear Ring and Amulet
chief_gear_priority.why_this: Chief Gear provides global buffs that apply in ALL combat modes. Ring (Troop Attack) and Amulet (Lethality) affect every troop in every battle.

reasons.claim: Chief Gear provides global buffs that apply in ALL combat modes.
Ring and Amulet have highest ROI due to universal application.

tradeoffs: Chief Gear upgrades are slow and expensive but provide permanent, universal value.
assumptions: You participate in multiple game modes
next_actions: Then Gloves/Boots based on your troop composition
